oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio I: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of program (12 projects) concerns crop husbandry. Researches concern kinetics of crop requirements, development of production systems, crop protection, adaptation of varieties to Organic farming, assessment of wheat genetic resources adapted to Organic farming, organic fertilization and mineralization.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio I: Crop husbandry. Runs 2001 - 2003. Programme Leader(s): Meynard, Jean-Marc; Simon, Sylvaine; Jouan, Bernard; Andrivon, D.; Ellissèche, Daniel; Ruffio-Châble, Véronique; Valentin-Morison, Muriel; Mouret, J.-C.; Touzard, Jean-Marc; Bressoud, Frédérique; Jonis, Monique; Boudon-Padieu, Elisabeth and Rolland, Bernard.
